title: Taking Clenbuterol: Uses, Side Effects, Risks and More

steps.title: In the United States, it’s used to treat airway obstructions in horses.
steps.content: In the United States, it’s used to treat airway obstructions in horses. Clenbuterol is not approved for human consumption within the United States. It’s only used on horses and sometimes cattle to treat infections and asthma. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Outside of the United States, it can treat bronchial asthma.
steps.content: Outside of the United States, it can treat bronchial asthma. You can usually find it in liquid or pill form. You must have a doctor’s prescription for it. [2] X Trustworthy Source U.S. National Capital Poison Center Independent poison control center providing resources to prevent poisonings and save lives Go to source

steps.title: It’s often used in bodybuilding circles for weight loss.
steps.content: It’s often used in bodybuilding circles for weight loss. Some people use clenbuterol to burn fat and gain muscle mass. [3] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source It works similarly to anabolic steroids, although it is not the same kind of drug. [4] X Trustworthy Source PubMed Central Journal archive from the U.S. National Institutes of Health Go to source

steps.title: Yes, you need a prescription from a medical professional.
steps.content: Yes, you need a prescription from a medical professional. If you live outside the U.S., your doctor may prescribe it for asthma or a related condition. [5] X Research source Your doctor will work with you to determine a safe and effective dose to treat your condition. A prescription for any other use, such as weight loss, would be considered “off-label.” [6] X Research source

steps.title: You can’t get a prescription for clenbuterol in the United States.
steps.content: You can’t get a prescription for clenbuterol in the United States. Clenbuterol isn’t approved by the FDA for human use in the U.S. [7] X Research source That means your doctor most likely can’t prescribe it to you legally. FDA-unapproved drugs can only be prescribed under certain special circumstances. [8] X Trustworthy Source US Food and Drug Administration U.S. government agency responsible for promoting public health Go to source

steps.title: Some people use clenbuterol without a prescription for weight loss.
steps.content: Some people use clenbuterol without a prescription for weight loss. Clenbuterol isn’t a controlled substance, which means that it’s not technically illegal to use it without a prescription. [9] X Research source People who want to use it for bodybuilding or weight loss typically buy it online, where it is sold in syrup, tablet, or injectable form. [10] X Trustworthy Source U.S. National Capital Poison Center Independent poison control center providing resources to prevent poisonings and save lives Go to source The most easily available forms of clenbuterol are formulated for use in livestock. However, some websites illegally sell prescription clenbuterol made for human use.

steps.title: The typical dose for weight loss is 120-160 mcg per day.
steps.content: The typical dose for weight loss is 120-160 mcg per day. When athletes use clenbuterol to burn fat, they usually start at a low dose of 40 mcg and gradually increase to 120-160 mcg over a 2 to 4-week period. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Follow your doctor’s instructions if you’re taking it for asthma.
steps.content: Follow your doctor’s instructions if you’re taking it for asthma. The usual dose range for treating asthma in humans is 20-40 mcg per day. [12] X Research source If you have a prescription for clenbuterol, ask your doctor or pharmacist how much of it you should take, and how often. Let your doctor know if you are taking any other medications, since they could interact with clenbuterol. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Some people report muscle spasms and agitation.
steps.content: Some people report muscle spasms and agitation. This is especially true if you take too much clenbuterol. You might also have overactive reflexes and heightened anxiety. [14] X Trustworthy Source Science Direct Online archive of peer-reviewed research on scientific, technical and medical topics Go to source

steps.title: Other side effects include rapid heart rate and chest pain.
steps.content: Other side effects include rapid heart rate and chest pain. One study reports that someone even had a heart attack because they took too much clenbuterol. If you feel any tightness in your chest or you can’t lower your resting heart rate, head to the emergency room right away. [15] X Trustworthy Source U.S. National Capital Poison Center Independent poison control center providing resources to prevent poisonings and save lives Go to source

steps.title: You may also have nausea, vomiting, fever, and chills.
steps.content: You may also have nausea, vomiting, fever, and chills. Gastrointestinal problems are common in people who abuse clenbuterol or take it for bodybuilding or weight-loss purposes. [16] X Research source People who are exposed to high doses of clenbuterol also sometimes report flu-like symptoms, like a fever or chills. [17] X Research source

steps.title: Yes, an overdose can be very dangerous.
steps.content: Yes, an overdose can be very dangerous. If you take more than your prescribed amount of clenbuterol, you could suffer from chest tightness, anxiety, elevated heart rate, vomiting, or a heart attack. If you do overdose on clenbuterol, go to the emergency room right away. [18] X Trustworthy Source Science Direct Online archive of peer-reviewed research on scientific, technical and medical topics Go to source Severe side effects and overdoses are common in people taking clenbuterol at the high doses needed for weight loss or muscle gain. [19] X Research source Be very cautious if you plan to use clenbuterol this way.

steps.title: It opens up the airways in your lungs.
steps.content: It opens up the airways in your lungs. Clenbuterol relaxes the smooth muscles in your bronchial tubes (airways), making it easier to breathe. Scientists still aren’t sure how its fat-burning properties work, however. [20] X Research source Once you’ve taken clenbuterol, it stays in your body for up to 39 hours. For this reason, you can continue to experience side effects for a long time after taking it.

steps.title: No, clenbuterol is banned by the World Anti-Doping Code.
steps.content: No, clenbuterol is banned by the World Anti-Doping Code. That means if you’re tested and caught using clenbuterol, you’ll be disqualified from your sport of choice. It’s listed as a performance-enhancing drug similar to steroids. [21] X Research source
